name: ReMoDDeD
savepath: This update adds a big new system to the mod, Limit Breaking! The player level cap has been raised to 125, but you will need to limit break and complete additional 'quests' in order to reach this new plateau of power. Expect this system to adapt and evolve over time, but I strongly recommend heading to our Discord or our Youtube for more info on this important change. As always, have fun!

Demon Tempering is a new system that allows you to combine body parts found from special monsters with special unique items to create a brand new item, with it's own special characteristics. This is an entirely new item quality; Tempered. Please both enjoy this dynamic system as well as be patient with it's future iterations. More info on this new addition can be found on our Discord and in your recipe menu.
